courseName: Functional Advanced Materials Engineering with Artificial Intelligence for Sustainability (FAMEAIS)
description: A well-established and working infrastructureThe FAMEAIS master programme (Functional Advanced Materials Engineering with Artificial Intelligence for Sustainability) is based on an existing Erasmus Mundus Joint Master FAME+ (Functional Advanced Materials and Engineering). It is running since 15 years and has granted more than 300 graduates, coming from the major countries from around the world.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
